channel.description: Recent content in üè¢ Northwestern Polytechnical University on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: 3D Focusing-and-Matching Network for Multi-Instance Point Cloud Registration
item.description: 3DFMNet: A novel two-stage network for multi-instance point cloud registration, achieving state-of-the-art accuracy by focusing on object centers first and then performing pairwise registration.

item.title: AlterMOMA: Fusion Redundancy Pruning for Camera-LiDAR Fusion Models with Alternative Modality Masking
item.description: AlterMOMA: A novel pruning framework significantly improves camera-LiDAR fusion models by identifying and removing redundant parameters through an alternative modality masking technique, achieving sta…

item.title: Customized Subgraph Selection and Encoding for Drug-drug Interaction Prediction
item.description: AI-powered drug interaction prediction gets a boost! CSSE-DDI uses neural architecture search to customize subgraph selection and encoding, resulting in superior accuracy and efficiency compared to e…

item.title: Emergence of heavy tails in homogenized stochastic gradient descent
item.description: Homogenized SGD reveals heavy-tailed neural network parameters, offering quantifiable bounds on tail-index and showcasing the interplay between optimization hyperparameters and model generalization.

item.title: Meta-Exploiting Frequency Prior for Cross-Domain Few-Shot Learning
item.description: Meta-Exploiting Frequency Prior enhances cross-domain few-shot learning by leveraging image frequency decomposition and consistency priors to improve model generalization and efficiency.
